definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to extort under false pretenses/to blackmail/to bluff/to defraud
to spread falsehoods/to increasingly distort the truth/to pile errors on top of errors (idiom)
to spread falsehoods/to increasingly distort the truth/to pile errors on top of errors (idiom)
unfounded rumor/to pass on a mistaken belief to others

sentences.english: There seems to always something wrong with this computer.
sentences.chinese: 來時這臺電腦近似出舛訛了。

sentences.english: He did the kidnapping as a way of extorting money.
sentences.chinese: 他綁架的目的只是爲了訛錢。

sentences.english: Don't misinform your doctor nor your lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 別向醫生和律師提供舛訛的新聞。

sentences.english: Many people falsely believe that great intelligence is required to learn a new language.
sentences.chinese: 很多人訛相信偉大的情報是需要學習一門新的語言。

sentences.english: Such a small mistake is pardonable.
sentences.chinese: 不會追究犯了那麼小的舛訛的。

sentences.english: It is quite common for youngsters to make such kind of mistake.
sentences.chinese: 小孩犯這種舛訛是較爲罕見的。

definition: to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
to expose/to bring to light/to disclose/revelation
